name: The Marketplace Coalition
goal: To communicate with the European Institutions, the actions taken and the views held by the Marketplace Coalition's members on issues that impact online e-commerce marketplaces which empower small sellers to reach global markets.
interests: Communication, Competition, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Enterprise, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and Technology, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
• E-commerce Directive.
• MOU, and anti-counterfeiting.
• Product Safety.
• VAT, Digital Taxation and anti-money laundering.
• Marketplace Liability
• Illegal Content
